name: bahmni-ndhm-tests
description: To test the ndhm compliance of Bahmni

scripts.qa01-NDHM: gauge run -p --env qa01 --tags 'HIPInitiatedLinking | (prescriptions & diagnostics) | OPConsultation' specs -v
scripts.qa02-NDHM: gauge run -p --env qa02 --tags 'HIPInitiatedLinking | (prescriptions & diagnostics) | OPConsultation' specs -v
